name: Fast Car Racing Extreme
description:
Fast Car Racing Extreme, the most classic car game. Drive, drift and race in city road! Highway Fast Car Racing Extreme racing game offers you unique driving experience that you can choose your own racing style.

In Experience advanced model of driving and accomplish great things on racing tracks. Feel the real speed and need for asphalt stunts. If simulation is what you are looking for, the simulator you will find - just let you immerse into racing world and become champion of the world.

If you want to conquer street and sky in fast car racing extreme, famous of drifting , the whole city is for you.
Believe your skills and full of confidence. The only way to win is to race as fast you can.
Super fast racing on the highway and asphalt, drag and drift driving with no worries for death! Fast Car Racing Extreme will feed your need.

Deathly fast car racing extreme barrel through packed streets, high-speed aerial stunts! the game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans.

But if you are interested in arcade racing you will also enjoy driving in this game - scalable realistic model of driving allows you drive however you like.

GAME FEATURES

* Realistic Controls
* 3 Different Modes
* Accurate physics.
* Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows
* Several different cameras.
* Different locations and cars to choose

Grab the steering wheel and become fastest driver on the leaderboards. Show them who is the ultimately awesome driver in Fast Car Racing Extreme.

Share with your friends & family and compete your HighScore with them...
Join us on facebook : www.facebook.com/gamingport559
For any suggestion / feedback for further improvements, feel free to contact us at gamingport559@gmail.com..
